name: Pelican Play Ball
description:
Pelican Play Ball is a fever dream clicker about keeping a Mexican ... uh, I mean, Pelican Wave alive.

Featuring:

- Break the Finchess World Record for Largest Pelican Wave

- Automatic waving devices

- Money for nothing

- Infinite Upgrades

- Make a friend with a monocle

- Be a cool bird

- With a Black t-shirt

- AND A CAP
